ack.p: We thank Melissa Booker and the United States Navy Southwest Division for their scientific and logistical support of this project. Many others were generous with their time and expertise, including Micaela Szykman Gunther, Richard Brown, Winston Vickers, Deanna Clifford, Andrew Bridges, David Garcelon, Linda Munson, Katie Prager, James Lloyd-Smith, Leslie Woods, and the Island Fox Working Group. We also thank the two anonymous reviewers whose comments helped improve this manuscript.
